name: Familytrip XXL
description:
Game for the 1st GameJam of GameDevSaar in the year 2020. Just play it.

There is a browser version, but keep in mind the .exe is way more stable and better optimized (and has the full content).

When playing in the browser mode, don't move for the first like 20 seconds, as the physics engine calculates all the AI-Vehicle spawns. After that time you should be able to play normally.

Its best just to use the .exe Version instead.

Have fun.
